eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A CHILD ABDUCTION EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Texas; AT 09:00 PM ON OCT 25, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 09:00 PM OCT 26, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: AMBER Alert: Child Abduction from Justiceberg, Texas. Suspect vehicle is a blue 2008 BMW 328i with Colorado license plate 7 7 8 5 3 4 5. Missing child is Cindy Casas Mejia, 11 year old Hispanic female and Edward Casas Mejia, 14 year old Hispanic male. Suspect is Magali Mejia Sanchez, 32 year old Hispanic female. If seen call 9 1 1.
